title: paramAdbhutamaina
sahitya:
paramAdbhutamaina nI sEva nEDu dorikenuga nE dhanyuDaiti


anupallavi

  darahAsa vadana shrI ranganAyakI vara ranganAtha dEva
tarama ninnu pogaDa shiva vidhIndradinuta munijanahita nannu brOvu vikhyAta
				(ciTTasvara)
dha pa dha dha ma pA ma pA ma ga ri sa ni sa ma ga ma nI , dhA ni sA* ri sa* nI dhA pa ma ga ma
dha pa dha mA , pa dha ni sa* sa* mA* ga* ma* gA* rI* sa* ni dha ri sA* , ni dha pa dha ga ma ni dha ni
				(svarasAhitya)
ubhaya kAvEri madhyamunan-uraga shayana kastUriranga caturvEdAnga
vibhava shobhita praNavAkAra vidyullasita vimAna para vAsudEva


caraNam 1    kanaka maNImayamaina maNTapamuna sakalAbharaNa bhUSituDai oyyAramuga
vanaja nayana sukhAsInuDai iru dikkula jUcu subhaktula tApamArccu
    caraNam 2    vidhi vibhISaNulu vencAmaramula vIva shuka saunakAdulu heccarikanu
yudhulu vEdamulacE koniyADa vaiSNavOttamulu draviDa prabandhamulu pATa
    caraNam 3    ghana mrdanga vINA vENu vAdyamulanu rasikulu hAyigavAyimpa
sanakAduludimpa dAsuDaina sadAshiva kavi gAnamu salupavEncEyu
